news.title: Bessent to propose major overhaul of regulatory body created from financial crisis
news.summary: Bessent will recommend changing the approach of the Financial Stability Oversight Council. In a letter set to be released Thursday, he will recommend changes to the council's approach.

news.title: Eli Lilly's next-generation obesity drug delivers strong weight loss, reduces knee pain in late-stage trial
news.summary: The drugmaker is betting big on retatrutide as the next pillar of its obesity portfolio after its weight loss injection Zepbound and its upcoming pill.

news.title: JetBlue unveils first ever airport lounge, BlueHouse. Here's what's inside
news.summary: JetBlue is set to open its first ever airport lounge, BlueHouse, at JFK next week. BlueHouse will be JetBlue's first airport lounge.

news.title: Here are the five big takeaways from Wednesday's Fed rate decision
news.summary: The Fed approved a much-anticipated quarter percentage point interest rate cut at a meeting that was packed with intrigue and surprises. The rate cut was the first in more than a decade.

news.title: Trump says U.S. seized oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela
news.summary: The U.S. has undertaken a large military buildup in the Caribbean. The White House has launched deadly strikes against boats that it claims were trafficking drugs.

news.title: Eli Lilly’s newest weight-loss drug relieved pain in patients with knee osteoarthritis
news.summary: Eli Lilly’s “triple g’ drug helped patients lose about 28.7% of their body weight. It also reduced pain associated with knee osteoarthritis in a Phase 3 trial.

news.title: NFL quarterback Philip Rivers couldn’t stay retired. Here’s why millions of other Americans can’t either.
news.summary: Philip Rivers’s unretirement, at age 44, probably feels familiar to the growing number of retirees — including FIRE members — who return to work.

news.title: The Fed will help drive a 10% gain for stocks in 2026, says one of Wall Street’s most accurate forecasters, Tom Lee
news.summary: A wall of worry headed into 2026 won’t stop stocks from logging more gains, says Fundstrat’s Tom Lee.

news.title: ‘Where are we vulnerable?’ My husband and I are in our 50s. Our $450K mortgage is paid off. We have $500K in IRAs.
news.summary: “We will not be downsizing our home, but we do have rental income of about $1,500 per month,” she says.

news.title: ‘This feels like an opportunity’: I’m 55, earn $78,000 and have no kids. My mother gave me $10,000. What should I do?
news.summary: “I also have $1,000 on a credit card, which will be paid in full next month,” she says.
